article_title: Garry Kasparov, Master Chess Player, Speaks Out on the Cold War and the West's Shameful Appeasement of Putin

og.description: Initially posted December 8, 2014. Original text below: “I think we've forgotten many important lessons of the Cold war,” says human-rights activist
og.title: Garry Kasparov, Master Chess Player, Speaks Out on the Cold War and the West's Shameful Appeasement of Putin

twitter.description:
Initially posted December 8, 2014. Original text below:
“I think we've forgotten many important lessons of the
Cold war,” says human-rights activist and former World Chess
Champion Garry
Kasparov. Especially when it comes to dealing with Russian
leader Vladimir Putin: “You cannot project weakness....Putin's game
is [not chess but] poker. And he knows how to bluff."
